str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
An act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires. From the prolonged form of ethelo; a determination, i.e. choice or inclination.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: To do that which is good. From agathopoios; to be a well-doer.
To muzzle, silence. From phimos; to muzzle.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Senseless, foolish, inconsiderate. Properly, mindless, i.e. Stupid, ignorant, egotistic, rash, or unbelieving.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
